con:method.name: product_update_without_paramaters
con:method.con:description: Allows You to Update a Product Attached to a Company on the Shoprocket Platform

con:parameter.con:name: companyid
con:parameter.con:description: The ID of company you want to add a product to

con:parameter.con:name: authkey
con:parameter.con:description: The authorisation key issued when the account was created

con:parameter.con:name: productid
con:parameter.con:description: The ID of the product you want to update

con:parameter.con:name: quantity
con:parameter.con:description: The quantity of the product you have for sale

con:parameter.con:name: externalid
con:parameter.con:description: Adds an external ID to tie to other stock control systems

con:parameter.con:name: notes
con:parameter.con:description: Adds any notes you have for the product

con:parameter.con:name: views
con:parameter.con:description: Adds the number of views the product has. Useful if you are porting from an existing system and do not want to start again.

con:parameter.con:name: weight
con:parameter.con:description: Weight of the product in KG's

con:parameter.con:name: strapline
con:parameter.con:description: The strapline of the product you wish to create.

con:parameter.con:name: rating
con:parameter.con:description: The current rating for the product. Useful if you are porting from an existing system and do not want to start again.

con:parameter.con:name: rating_count
con:parameter.con:description: The overall (max) rating. Useful if you are porting from an existing system and do not want to start again.

con:parameter.con:name: imagename
con:parameter.con:description: The name of the image if you want to bypass shoprockets image CDN

con:parameter.con:name: image
con:parameter.con:description: The location of the image (absolute URL) if you want to bypass shoprockets image CDN

con:parameter.con:name: customfields
con:parameter.con:description: Any custom fields you want to attach to the product

con:parameter.con:name: meta
con:parameter.con:description: Sets any search able meta you want to associate with the product
